section1.description: Our Rewards Program has ended, but we will offer new rewards in a few weeks. We will update you through email with your total number of credits soon. For now please join our social media channels to keep up with the latest news.
section1.heading: Welcome to Crypto!

ipFilter.title: Unable to provide our service
ipFilter.message: Apologies. According to your IP address, you seem to be located at a country/region/territory where we currently do not provide service. We may not make all of the Services available in all markets and jurisdictions, and may restrict or prohibit the use of all or a portion of the Services from Restricted Locations, which at this time include Hong Kong, Cuba, Iran, North Korea, Crimea, Sudan, Malaysia, Syria, U.S.A. [including all U.S.A. territories like Puerto Rico, American Samoa, Guam, Northern Mariana Island, and the US Virgin Islands (St. Croix, St. John and St. Thomas)], Bangladesh, Bolivia, Ecuador, and Kyrgyzstan.

failureReason.badQuality: A high-resolution photo is required for identity verification. Please upload a clear, original color photo of your ID, taken with a camera.
failureReason.blurred: A clear photo is required for identity verification. Please upload a clear, original color photo of your ID, taken with a camera.
failureReason.cameraBlackWhite: Please upload a color photo of your ID, taken with a camera.
failureReason.damagedDocument: The file you uploaded is damaged. Please upload a different original color photo of your entire ID with a valid signature.
failureReason.deniedUnsupportedIdCountry: Sorry, your country is restricted at this time. Our platform and token sale are closed to US citizens and residents, but we will notify you when that changes.
failureReason.deniedUnsupportedIdType: Sorry, the form of ID that you uploaded is not of a supported type. Please supply a government issued id.
failureReason.differentPersonsShown: Your photo contains multiple people. Please upload a photo only of yourself.
failureReason.digitalCopy: Please upload an original color photo of your ID. Photos of IDs displayed on screens are not permitted.
failureReason.hiddenPartDocument: The file you uploaded is missing information. Please upload an original color photo of your entire ID with a valid signature.
failureReason.missingBack: Please upload an original color photo of the back of your original ID.
failureReason.missingPartDocument: The file you uploaded is missing information. Please upload an original color photo of your entire ID with a valid signature.
failureReason.missingSignature: The file you uploaded is missing a signature. Please upload an original color photo of your ID with a valid signature.
failureReason.noDocument: Please upload an original color photo of your ID, taken with a camera.
failureReason.photocopyBlackWhite: A black and white photocopied version of your ID is not acceptable for identity verification. Please upload an original color photo of your ID, taken with a camera.
failureReason.photocopyColor: A photocopied version of your ID is not acceptable for identity verification. Please upload an original color photo of your ID, taken with a camera.
failureReason.selfieVerificationFailed: The face image you provided does not meet the requirements. Please provide a clear, color, non-cropped picture of your face taken with a camera.
failureReason.unknown: Identity verification has failed. Please retry.
failureReason.wrongDocumentPage: The file you uploaded is not acceptable for identity verification. Please upload an original color photo of your ID, taken with a camera.

recaptchaError.description: There was an error while loading ReCaptcha. Please refresh the page to try again.

requirements.braveBrowser: Brave Browser users: The Crypto identity verification process does not currently work properly with your browser. Please use a different browser for identity verification.
requirements.digitalPhoto: A photo of yourself, with your entire face visible and without any accessories such as glasses when taking the photo. The photo should be well lit and in focus.
requirements.identityCard: A digital photo of your government-issued ID (e.g. passport or driver's license) - it must have a photo of you on it.
requirements.intro: In order to verify your identity and start trading on Crypto, you will need the following:
requirements.southKoreaJapanCitizens: Residents from South Korea, China and Japan will need to provide a passport as a form of identification - other forms of government IDs are not permitted.
requirements.usCitizens: Unfortunately, for now, we do not serve customers in the following countries/regions/territories: Hong Kong, Cuba, Iran, North Korea, Crimea, Sudan, Malaysia, Syria, USA [including all USA territories like Puerto Rico, American Samoa, Guam, Northern Mariana Island, and the US Virgin Islands (St. Croix, St. John and St. Thomas)], Bangladesh, Bolivia, Ecuador, and Kyrgyzstan. We hope to be able to enable Crypto access for more markets and jurisdictions in the future.

logIn.countryDisclaimer: In accordance with our Terms and Conditions, persons that are located in or a resident of the <1>United States of America or any other jurisdiction where the services offered by crypto are restricted</1> are prohibited from holding positions or trading on crypto.

api.needKYC: API access is not available until your account passes KYC.

read.label: Read
read.tooltip: The Read privilege allows the key to be used to retrieve current and historical orders, positions, balances, and transfer history.

transfer.label: Transfer
transfer.tooltip: The Transfer privilege allows the key be used to request withdrawals, transfer funds between subaccounts, and view deposit addresses.

write.label: Write
write.tooltip: The Write privilege allows the key to be used to insert, modify, or cancel orders.

api.subaccount: To generate an API key for a subaccount, switch to that subaccount and press Create New Key to generate an independent API key for that subaccount.
api.title: API

create.afterCreate: Congratulations on creating your trading competition! Traders can join your competition by visiting the join link below, or by entering your competition join code on this page.
create.description: Start a competition to compete and compare performance against fellow traders. When a trader joins Crypto through your competition join link, you will earn a percentage of your referred traders' trading fees.

label.code: Custom code used to join this competition
label.isPublic: Permit this competition to be listed publicly and allow anyone to join from the leaderboard page.
label.name: Give your competition a name

join.description: Enter the competition code provided to you by a competition organizer to join a competition.

leaderboardName.error: Leaderboard names cannot be longer than 100 characters.
leaderboardName.errorMin: Leaderboard names must be at least 3 characters long.
leaderboardName.tooltip: Your leaderboard name will be displayed next to your rank and performance on competition leaderboards.

list.empty: You have not joined any competitions. Enter a competition code below to join, or create your own competition and invite traders with the competition code generated.

competitions.namePrompt: You must choose a leaderboard name before creating a competition. This name will be displayed next to your rank and performance on competition leaderboards.
competitions.title: Competitions

history.disclaimer: Transactions in this summary are delayed up to 5 minutes. This summary may not include transactions completed in the last few minutes. This summary does not include unrealized P&L. All values are in USD.
history.title: History

preferences.closePositionConfirmation: Display confirmation after Close Position button is clicked
preferences.confirmations: Display confirmation dialog before placing trades
preferences.orderStatusNotifications: Display notifications for order status updates
preferences.title: Preferences

affiliatePayout.title: Referral Payout
affiliatePayout.tooltip: This is the commission you will earn on fees paid by your referrals for the first 90 days after they sign-up. Your commission may go down after that period. Check support for details.

feeCredits.label: Trading Fee Credits
feeCredits.moreDetails: See the {{link}} page for more details.
feeCredits.tooltip: This is a credit you have earned that may be applied toward trading fees.

fees.description: The above maker-taker fees are applied across all contracts at Crypto.
fees.title: Fees

feeDiscount.title: Fee Discount
feeDiscount.tooltip: This is your current aggregate fee discount. This value may be the result of a combination of fee discounts. If you have earned lower fees from membership in a volume tier, this fee discount will be applied on top of those lower fees.

tradingBonus.label: Trading Bonus
tradingBonus.tooltip: This is a bonus you have earned that may be applied towards fees, funding payments, and realized losses. It may not be withdrawn.

volume.label: Trailing 30-Day Volume
volume.tierTooltip: Volume tiers unlock lower fees across all contracts. See the "Crypto Fees and Rebates" page for details. Any additional fee discounts earned below are applied on top of active volume tier fee discounts.
volume.title: Trading Volume

staking.description: You have the chance to earn extra BTC by staking your CRYP Tokens! 10% of Crypto Insurance Fund net inflows are paid to CRYP Token stakers every two weeks. If the Crypto Insurance Fund experiences a net outflow over the period, 10% of the outflow amount will be deducted from the staked CRYP Token pool. Distributions are pro-rata, based on time and quantity staked. {{link}} to learn more about staking your CRYP Tokens.

footer.bullet1: Unstake requests are processed after payouts every two weeks.
footer.bullet2: Staked CRYP Tokens continue to count towards fee discount tiers.
footer.bullet3: You can see a history of staking payouts in {{link}}.

info.expectedShareTooltip: This is the share of the payout that you will receive assuming no other traders add to their stake.
info.pendingUnstakeTooltip: Your CRYP Tokens will be released {{date}}
info.totalPayoutTooltip: This is the total payout that would be made to the CRYP Token staking pool if the period ended right now. Note that your current expected share of this payout is listed above.

staking.noACDXTokens: You do not have any CRYP tokens available to stake. You may purchase CRYP tokens with Bitcoin in the {{link}} market.
staking.title: Crypto Staking

subaccounts.description: Subaccounts allow you to isolate collateral and positions into their own separately margined account. {{link}} to learn more about trading with subaccounts.
subaccounts.title: Subaccounts

transfers.collateralDisclaimer: Note: {{tokenCode}} is not currently a supported form of collateral for derivative positions on Crypto. We will be adding support for non-BTC collateral in the coming weeks. In the meantime, you may deposit {{tokenCode}} to trade spot markets.

depositUSD.title: Deposit and Withdraw USD with any of the following Stablecoins

transfers.needKYC: Deposits and withdrawals are not available until your account passes KYC.
transfers.title: Transfers

withdrawals.disclaimer: Please verify your withdrawal address. We cannot refund an incorrect withdrawal.
withdrawals.timeRemainingDetail: For security purposes, you will have to re-login to your account after this time in order to withdraw funds.
withdrawals.timeRemainingDisclaimer: For security purposes, you must log in again to withdraw funds. Funds can only be withdrawn within 15 minutes of account login.
withdrawals.title: Withdrawals
withdrawals.withdrawalFee: There is a {{withdrawalFee}} {{token}} fee for this withdrawal.  You will receive your requested withdrawal amount less {{withdrawalFee}} once confirmed.

features.fairness: One exchange, fair access to global contracts
features.title: Crypto Features

password.passwordRequirements: Passwords must be at least 8 characters long, and require at least one number, upper and lowercase letter, and special character.

referral.title: Looks like you found a referral code! For a limited time only, sign up to receive a 20% discount off fees for your first six months of trading.

title: Crypto | Crypto Derivatives Exchange | Trade Bitcoin Futures, Options, Structured Products

accountDetails.disabledMaxLeverageTooltip: Max Account Leverage can only be adjusted when there are no open positions or orders
accountDetails.title: Account

accountBalance.availableMarginDescription: The amount of your balance available for placing new orders and taking new positions. If negative, this is the amount of funds you need to deposit or otherwise make available in order to place new orders and grow positions. See "Help & Support" for details.
accountBalance.buyingPowerDescription: The amount of your balance available for placing new orders and taking new positions. If negative, this is the amount of funds you need to deposit or otherwise make available in order to place new orders and grow positions. See "Help & Support" for details.
accountBalance.dayPlDescription: Changes in Total P/L for the day (since midnight UTC).
accountBalance.effectiveLeverageDescription: Effective Leverage is the total market value of all positions divided by account value (total collateral).
accountBalance.initialMarginDescription: The total collateral required to grow your current positions. See "Help & Support" for details.
accountBalance.liquidationLevelDescription: The total collateral required to stay in your positions. If this level is breached, your entire portfolio will be auto-liquidated.
accountBalance.netLiquidityDescription: Total token balance value plus all unrealized P/L.
accountBalance.orderHoldsDescription: The amount of your balance being used to hold active orders. If you close orders, this value will decrease and more margin will be available. If your orders are converted to open / increased positions, this value will decrease and your initial margin requirement will increase. See "Help & Support" for details.
accountBalance.realizedPlDescription: Realized profit or loss (P/L) from positions that have been closed or partially closed during the current day plus fees incurred (since midnight UTC).
accountBalance.totalPlDescription: Unrealized profit or loss (P/L) from all open positions plus realized P/L from the current day (since midnight UTC).
accountBalance.unrealizedPlDescription: Unrealized profit or loss (P/L) from open positions.

contract.maxLeverageTooltip: Max leverage for {{contract}} at {{position}} position is {{maxLeverage}}x. As your position size increases, your maximum available leverage will decrease.

swap.info: If positive, longs pay shorts. If negative, shorts pay longs.
swap.title: {{contractCode}} Perpetual Swap Funding

convert.body: Converting your negative USD balance will deduct from your other token balances to bring your USD balance to 0.
convert.title: Convert Negative Balance

deposit.message: You must deposit funds to start trading on Crypto.
deposit.title: Next Step: Fund Your Account

kyc.message: You must verify your identity to start trading on Crypto.
kyc.title: Next Step: Verify Your Identity

modal.optOut: No thanks. I would like to stay on this page.

tokenTerms.checkbox: I agree to the above terms

default.paragraph1: By checking the box below you hereby understand, agree, and acknowledge that the Tokens and the Platform are only available outside of the United States and to non-U.S. Persons, and are not available to persons with whom, or in jurisdictions where, transactions involving digital assets are prohibited or in any manner restricted by applicable laws or regulations. There is currently substantial uncertainty in various jurisdictions as to the application of securities, commodities, financial, tax, and other laws and any regulations relating to Tokens and digital assets, and the application of other laws and regulations may be fact-specific and subject to change. The Tokens are intended to be made available for use on the Crypto Platform. Although not intended to be the offer and sale of a security, there is a significant risk that any offer and sale of the Tokens could nonetheless be deemed to constitute the offer and sale of a security by the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission or other regulatory authorities. You are required to inform yourself about, and to observe, any restrictions relating to the Tokens and any related documents and communications in your jurisdiction and comply with all applicable laws in connection with any offer, sale, or transfer of the Tokens. The Tokens may not be offered, sold, or otherwise transferred, except in full compliance with all transfer restrictions, transfer prerequisites, and all applicable laws, rules, and regulations of the transferor’s and transferee’s jurisdictions. In particular, the Tokens may not be transferred to, or for the account or benefit of, U.S. Persons or in the United States, and the Company reserves the right to impose restrictions to prevent or void any resales that could be deemed to violate applicable laws.

saftHolder.paragraph1: By checking the box below you hereby agree and acknowledge that in exchange for the CRYP Tokens (the “Tokens”) hereby delivered to you (the “Holder”) by BW Group Ltd., an exempted company organized under the laws of Seychelles (“Company”), all of Company’s obligations under that certain Agreement for Future Tokens (the “Agreement”), by and between you and the Company, are satisfied in full and terminated pursuant to Section 1(e) of the Agreement.
saftHolder.paragraph2: You further understand, agree, and acknowledge that the Tokens and the Platform are only available outside of the United States and to non-U.S. Persons, and are not available to persons with whom, or in jurisdictions where, transactions involving digital assets are prohibited or in any manner restricted by applicable laws or regulations. There is currently substantial uncertainty in various jurisdictions as to the application of securities, commodities, financial, tax, and other laws and any regulations relating to Tokens and digital assets, and the application of other laws and regulations may be fact-specific and subject to change. The Tokens are intended to be made available for use on the Crypto Platform. Although not intended to be the offer and sale of a security, there is a significant risk that any offer and sale of the Tokens could nonetheless be deemed to constitute the offer and sale of a security by the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission or other regulatory authorities. You are required to inform yourself about, and to observe, any restrictions relating to the Tokens and any related documents and communications in your jurisdiction and comply with all applicable laws in connection with any offer, sale, or transfer of the Tokens. The Tokens may not be offered, sold, or otherwise transferred, except in full compliance with all transfer restrictions, transfer prerequisites, and all applicable laws, rules, and regulations of the transferor’s and transferee’s jurisdictions. In particular, the Tokens may not be transferred to, or for the account or benefit of, U.S. Persons or in the United States, and the Company reserves the right to impose restrictions to prevent or void any resales that could be deemed to violate applicable laws.
saftHolder.paragraph3: By checking the box below you hereby represent and warrant that each of the representations and warranties contained in Section 5 of the Agreement is true and correct as of the date hereof as though made as of the date hereof.

notifications.empty: You have no notifications at this time.
notifications.kycError: Could not place order. You must pass KYC before you are able to trade on Crypto.

accepted.body: Your {{orderType}} order to {{buyOrSell}} {{size}} contracts of {{contractCode}}{{priceStr}} has been {{action}}.
accepted.subject: Order accepted

canceled.body: Your order to {{buyOrSell}} {{size}} contracts of {{contractCode}}{{priceStr}} has been canceled.
canceled.subject: Order canceled

filled.body: Your order to {{buyOrSell}} {{size}} contracts of {{contractCode}}{{priceStr}} has been filled at {{avgFillPrice}}.
filled.subject: Order filled

filledPartial.body: {{delta}} contracts of your order to {{buyOrSell}} {{contractCode}} have been filled at {{fillPrice}} ({{remaining}} contracts remaining).
filledPartial.subject: Order partially filled

modified.body: Your order to {{buyOrSell}} {{contractCode}} has been modified. It is now a {{orderType}} order to {{buyOrSell}} {{size}} contracts of {{contractCode}}{{priceStr}}.
modified.subject: Order modified

message.fundsLimit: Cannot place order to {{side}} {{size}} {{contractCode}}. With current funds, the maximum allowable size for a {{contractCode}} {{side}} order would be {{maxSize}}. Add funds, cancel orders, or close positions if you would like to place a larger order.
message.fundsLimitCombined: Cannot place order to {{side}} {{size}} {{contractCode}}. With current funds, the maximum allowable {{contractCode}} position would be {{positionLimitFromFunds}} contracts. This order (combined with other open orders) could put you over that limit. Add funds, cancel orders, or close positions if you would like to place a larger order.
message.fundsLimitZero: Cannot place order to {{side}} {{size}} {{contractCode}}. Add funds, cancel orders, or close positions to {{side}} {{contractCode}}.
message.invalidPostOnly: Your post-only order would have crossed as a non-maker and has been rejected.
message.invalidReduceOnly: Your reduce-only order has the same direction as your current position and has been rejected.
message.limitPriceProtection: Limit orders that cross must be priced within {{threshold}}% of the reference price.
message.maintenance: The {{contractCode}} market is currently closed for maintenance.
message.maxOrders: Active orders may not exceed {{maxOrders}} per contract
message.positionLimitCombined: Cannot place order to {{side}} {{size}} {{contractCode}}. This order (combined with other open orders) could put you over the position limit for {{contractCode}} of {{positionLimit}} contracts.
message.positionLimitSingle: Cannot place order for {{quantity}} {{contractCode}}. This order would put you over the position limit for {{contractCode}} of {{positionLimit}} contracts.
message.selfTrade: Your order would have crossed as a self-trade and has been rejected.

triggered.body: Your order to {{buyOrSell}} {{size}} contracts of {{contractCode}} has triggered and will be included in the next auction.
triggered.subject: Order triggered

complete.body: Liquidation of your positions is complete. Your existing orders have been canceled, but you may now insert new orders.
complete.subject: Account liquidation complete

liquidation.body: Your total collateral has fallen below the liquidation level. Your positions will be liquidated immediately.
liquidation.subject: Account liquidation

orderBook.title: Order Book
orderBook.yourOrder: Size remaining of your active orders at this price level.
orderBook.incrementAggregation: Increase order book level aggregation. Current Aggregation: {{currentAggregation}}
orderBook.decrementAggregation: Decrease order book level aggregation. Current Aggregation: {{currentAggregation}}

orderEntry.autoliquidationTooltip: Placing this order will result in automatic account liquidation.

confirmation.liqDelta: Mark Price / Est. Liq Price Difference
confirmation.title: Order Confirmation

orderEntry.marketQtyEstimateCaution: Caution: This quantity is an estimate of how much {{contractCode}} can be traded at your entered notional value based on current market depth. A market order will be submitted for this amount, but we cannot garauntee that it will execute at the exact notional value entered.
orderEntry.marketValueEstimateCaution: Caution: This value is an estimate of how much USD can be traded for your entered contract quantity based on current market depth. We cannot garauntee that your market order will trade for the exact amount shown above.

postOnly.title: Post-only
postOnly.tooltip: A post-only order will only execute if it would be filled as a maker. Otherwise, it will be rejected. Post-only orders are used by market makers to ensure they earn the maker rebate.

reduceOnly.title: Reduce-only
reduceOnly.tooltip: A reduce-only order can only reduce your position size, not increase it. Use reduce-only to ensure that the execution of this order does not grow your position.

orderEntry.stopDescription: Stop orders let you specify a price below which (for sells) or above which (for buys) the order will trigger. This order type can help traders limit losses.

stopTrigger.title: Trigger
stopTrigger.tooltip: Specifies whether the order should trigger when the stop price crosses the mark price, last trade price, or underlying index price.

stopType.title: Execute as
stopType.tooltip: Specifies whether this order will execute as a limit order or market order when your trigger price is reached.

orderEntry.takeProfitDescription: Take Profit orders let you specify a price at or above which (for sells) or at or below which (for buys) the order will trigger. This order type can help traders set profit targets or open positions.
orderEntry.title: Order Entry

tooltip.notional: The amount the trigger price needs to move (in price currency) in the direction of the order to trigger the stop. For example, if this is a stop buy and the offset is $5, the stop will trigger if the trigger price moves up $5 from it's low during the lifetime of the order.
tooltip.percent: The amount the trigger price needs to move (in % of price currency) in the direction of the order to trigger the stop. For example, if this is a stop buy and the offset is 5%, the stop will trigger if the trigger price moves up 5% from it's low during the lifetime of the order.

tooltip.stop: The price at or below which (for sells) or above which (for buys) the order will trigger.
tooltip.take: The price at or above which (for sells) or at or below which (for buys) the order will trigger.

columns.dateTooltip: The time at which the order was submitted.
columns.name: Name
columns.priceTooltip: If this is a stop or take-profit order, this refers to the stop price or take price, respectively.
columns.triggerPriceTooltip: Refers to the stop price or take-profit price and only applies to stop and take-profit orders.

positions.avgExecutionPriceFull: Average execution price over the life of this position.

balances.freeBalanceTooltip: Your total token balance not reserved by withdrawal requests or open spot orders.
balances.title: Balances

positions.dayPlDescription: Changes in Total P/L for the day (since midnight UTC).
positions.liquidationPriceDescription: The contract mark price at which your account will be liquidated, assuming the size and market value of your other positions do not change.
positions.liquidationPriceTooltip: Changes in the price of this contract will not independently result in liquidation if this is the only position held.
positions.markPriceDescription: The marking price used for unrealized P/L and auto-liquidation decisions. See Help & Support for more info.
positions.realizedPlDescription: Realized profit or loss (P/L) from positions that have been closed or partially closed during the current day plus fees incurred (since midnight UTC).
positions.title: Positions
positions.totalPlDescription: Unrealized profit or loss (P/L) from all open positions plus realized P/L from the current day (since midnight UTC).
positions.unrealizedPlDescription: Unrealized profit or loss (P/L) from open positions.

tradeMode.confirmClosePosition: Closing your position will result in a market {{orderType}} order of {{size}} {{contract}}.
tradeMode.noPosition: You do not currently have a position in {{contract}}.
tradeMode.title: Trade Mode

alias.length: Alias must be from {{minLength}} to {{maxLength}} characters long

email.length: Email must contain at maximum {{maxLength}} characters

multipleOf.invalid: Field must be a multiple of {{step}}

password.length: Password must contain at least {{minLength}} characters

verifyEmail.message: We've sent you an email with a verification code. <1></1> Please enter the code below to continue.
verifyEmail.title: Verify Your Email

verifyMobile.message: We've sent you a text with a verification code. <1></1> Please enter the code below to continue.
verifyMobile.title: Verify Your Mobile

waitlist.learnAboutFuturesLink: You can now take time and <1>learn about futures trading.</1>
waitlist.subtitle: We will notify you when your application has been accepted.
waitlist.title: You're on the Waitlist,
